title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 80.103 - Institutional dispensers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 80.103 - Institutional dispensers

State Regulations

Persons acting as institutional dispensers of controlled substances shall keep records required by article 33 of the Public Health Law, and as otherwise provided by this Part and in particular section
80.48. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
80.103

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
